SEARCH
Module Ordering_System
Package datamodel

Interface NameSplitter

public interface NameSplitter
NameSplitter splits a single-String name into last- and first name parts returning as NameSplitter.SplitName.

Name splitting follows rules:

  • If a name contains no seperators (comma or semicolon [,;]), trailing consecutive parts form the last name, while prior parts form the first name, e.g. "Tim Anton Schulz-Müller", splits into first name: "Tim Anton" and last name "Schulz-Müller".
  • Names with seperators (comma or semicolon [,;]) split into a last name part before the seperator and a first name part after the seperator, e.g. "Schulz-Müller, Tim Anton" splits into first name: "Tim Anton" and last name "Schulz-Müller".
  • Leading and trailing white spaces [\s], commata [,;] and quotes ["'] are trimmed from names, e.g. " 'Schulz-Müller, Tim Anton' ".
  • White spaces between name parts are trimmed as well, e.g. "Schulz-Müller, <white-spaces> Tim <white-spaces> Anton <white-spaces> ". 
 Examples:
 +--------------------------------+----------------------+-----------------+
 |Single-String name              |first name parts      |last name parts  |
 +--------------------------------+----------------------+-----------------+
 |"Eric Meyer"                    |"Eric"                |"Meyer"          |
 |"Meyer, Anne"                   |"Anne"                |"Meyer"          |
 |"Meyer; Anne"                   |"Anne"                |"Meyer"          |
 |"Tim Schulz‐Mueller"            |"Tim"                 |"Schulz‐Mueller" |
 |"Nadine Ulla Blumenfeld"        |"Nadine Ulla"         |"Blumenfeld"     |
 |"Nadine‐Ulla Blumenfeld"        |"Nadine‐Ulla"         |"Blumenfeld"     |
 |"Khaled Saad Mohamed Abdelalim" |"Khaled Saad Mohamed" |"Abdelalim"      |
 +--------------------------------+----------------------+-----------------+
 
 Trim leading, trailing and interim white spaces and quotes:
 +--------------------------------+----------------------+-----------------+
 |" 'Eric Meyer'  "               |"Eric"                |"Meyer"          |
 |"Nadine     Ulla    Blumenfeld" |"Nadine Ulla"         |"Blumenfeld"     |
 +--------------------------------+----------------------+-----------------+
